do_ancova_alternative¶

Description¶

This function performs multi-way ANCOVA or ANOVA analysis

Usage¶

do_ancova_alternative(
  df_data,
  df_metadata,
  indep_var,
  indep_var2,
  group,
  group2,
  dep_var,
  test_type,
  adjust_method = "bonferroni",
  connected_or_independent_ancova = FALSE,
  num_covariates = 1
)

CALOR
